holidays.title: International Day of Women and Girls in Science
holidays.description: Honor women’s achievements in science and place a much-needed focus on girls entering STEM careers.

holidays.title: National Guitar Day
holidays.description: There's more to the guitar than just the players; a fascinating history of a versatile instrument.

holidays.title: Armed Forces Day
holidays.description: Get ready to know the facts about the creation of the Armed Forces Day in Liberia.

holidays.title: Be Electrific Day
holidays.description: Explore the history and significance of the invention of the light bulb and its creator.

holidays.title: Don't Cry Over Spilled Milk Day
holidays.description: Could you be crying over spilled milk and don’t even know it?

holidays.title: Get Out Your Guitar Day
holidays.description: Tune your guitar and grab your favorite pick, we’re going to rock the world of music!

holidays.title: Global Movie Day
holidays.description: Grab your popcorn and get ready to celebrate your favorite movies all day!

holidays.title: Grandmother Achievement Day
holidays.description: Get ready to spoil and celebrate your grandmother on this day dedicated just to them.

holidays.title: Islamic Revolution Day
holidays.description: Let us take you through one of the important events in Iranian history — the Islamic Revolution.

holidays.title: National Ava Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate the heritage of one of the most beautiful names in the world.

holidays.title: National Emergency Number Day
holidays.description: On this day, 112 became the common emergency number in the European Union.

holidays.title: National Foundation Day
holidays.description: National Foundation Day commemorates the establishment of Japan by Emperor Jimmu in 660 B.C.

holidays.title: National Inventors' Day
holidays.description: We've come a long way since the invention of the wheel, and that's worth celebrating.

holidays.title: National Latte Day
holidays.description: Drink a latte as you read about and celebrate National Latte Day with us.

holidays.title: National Make a Friend Day
holidays.description: "There are no strangers in the world, just friends you have never met."

holidays.title: National Marc Day
holidays.description: Get ready to honor one of the most historic names in the world.

holidays.title: National Peppermint Patty Day
holidays.description: Get ready to feast on these creamy, tasty, and yummy peppermint treats.

holidays.title: National Shut-in Visitation Day
holidays.description: National Shut-In Visitation Day commemorates people who are unable to leave their homes.

holidays.title: National Van Day
holidays.description: Get ready to honor one of the most popular names in the world.

holidays.title: Pro Sports Wives Day
holidays.description: Explore the significance of the women behind the players this Pro Sports Wives Day!

holidays.title: Promise Day
holidays.description: Get ready as we celebrate one of the most special days of Valentine's week — Promise Day!

holidays.title: Royal Hobart Regatta
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating one of the oldest and most prestigious events in Tasmania.

holidays.title: Satisfied Staying Single Day
holidays.description: Who needs a partner when you can spoil yourself rotten on Satisfied Staying Single Day?

holidays.title: White T Shirt Day
holidays.description: Get your White T-shirts ready to celebrate a historic landmark event in the automobile industry.

holidays.title: World Day of the Sick
holidays.description: Lend a helping hand to the ailing as we mark World Day of the Sick.

holidays.title: Youth Day Cameroon
holidays.description: Celebrate Youth Day with youths from around the world as we look towards a brighter future.

holidays.title: Brandy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Success is inevitable for someone as multi-talented in music, acting, and modeling as Brandy.

holidays.title: Burt Reynolds’s Birthday
holidays.description: Burt Reynolds was multi-talented and there was nothing he couldn’t do in his life.

holidays.title: Cody Herbinko’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Instagram and YouTube star rose to fame thanks to his charming personality and good looks!

holidays.title: Jennifer Aniston’s Birthday
holidays.description: From her sense of fashion to her friendships, we love Aniston for her humor and compassion.

holidays.title: Mehgan James’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about why Mehgan James left “Bad Girls Club” and more right here!

holidays.title: Roseanne Park’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this beautiful lead vocalist and dancer from “Blackpink,” the sky’s the limit!

holidays.title: Sarah Palin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's toast the first female Republican vice presidential candidate and governor right here!

holidays.title: Taylor Lautner’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about Taylor Lautner, the actor who played Jacob Black in the famous “Twilight Saga.”

holidays.title: Thomas Edison’s Birthday
holidays.description: This genius rose from rags to riches and we’re here to celebrate his special day!

holidays.title: Yung Miami’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate Yung Miami, a very attractive woman with a charming personality.
